name: atrium
description:
You're standing in a large open-space atrium on the ground floor of the Red Gate offices.
The smell of coffee and smart people hangs in the air.

Looking around you, the area extends to the East and West with a reception area, seating, a library and a kitchen. North leads out of the office whilst toilets are to the south.
Lifts to other office floors also depart from here.

inventory.name: smell of coffee
inventory.detailedDescription: You'll need to head to the kitchen.

attributes.defaultResult:
The coffee machine is in the kitchen.
Off you go!
attributes.smell:
Yup, smells like coffee here.
Good coffee at that.

inventory.name: air
inventory.description: smell of smart people and coffee
inventory.detailedDescription: As I said - smart people and coffee.

attributes.defaultResult: The place is full of 'em. Go explore!
attributes.smell: You detect the slightly warm, damp, youthful smell of Cambridge graduates.

inventory.name: button
inventory.detailedDescription: If you push the button, perhaps a lift may come.

attributes.defaultResult: $action press

inventory.name: screen
inventory.detailedDescription:
It's cycling through news, traffic reports and the names of visitors for the day.
Apparently the A14 is broken again.
Ooh! It has your name up there too - 'Welcome $player'.
At least someone is expecting you.

missions.name: destroyscreen
missions.description: It screams 'destroy me' (or perhaps that's just a hidden violent streak you have) but you'd better be quick about it before anyone sees you.

reward.successMessage: Bad you! Sometimes you just have to resist your violent urges.
reward.failMessage: Never mind, it's probably better left alone.

reward.eventMessage: You've probably kept out of the way long enough to go and chat to Jordan again without suspicion if you feel like taking on another 'job'.

reward.successMessage:
Wow, you're boring! You've spent a total of 25 turns doing absolutely nothing.
Have 5 points as some encouragement to get moving.

You're quite the explorer!
Congratulations, you've found every location.

Hey, that's some impressive adventuring!
You've found 100 locations.
Whoa, you're out of control. You need to seriously work on your anger management.
You seem to be a bit of a liability. Time to stop trashing the place maybe?
Stealing may be one way of achieving your goals but it really doesn't fit in with our values.

I like your attitude to learning, keep it up
Only three more items left to read!
You read 'all the things'!
You're quite a chatterbox. We like people who talk and collaborate.
Wow, you spoke to everyone. That's quite a network you're building up.

missions.name: bff
missions.displayName: gain affinity from one character up to level 15

reward.successMessage: You're making a real effort here. Looks like you've almost got a best friend forever!
We could do with someone like you on the first-aid team. You've got quite the healing skills.

You've really 'got it' with the healing activities.
(Although where that level of repeated injury in an office environment came from is somewhat worrying.)

missions.name: asshole
missions.displayName: really upset a lot of people

reward.successMessage:
You need to sort yourself out, people here think you're becoming quite the piece of work.
We have a 'no assholes' rule here you know.

missions.name: lovedbyall
missions.displayName: make yourself popular with nearly everyone

reward.successMessage: Wow. You're winning in the popularity stakes!

You're treading a fine line here. Admittedly you can't make an omelette without breaking some eggs but your actions aren't making you popular.
We'll give you the benefit of the doubt for now and assume you're ruffling feathers for the greater good.
You're think you're quite the artist, don't you.

You seem to be writing quite a few notes.
Anyone would think you're destined for management.

missions.name: junioroccultist
missions.displayName: draw a pentagram on a floor

reward.successMessage:
Hmm. It seems we have a budding occultist here.
You might be getting ahead of yourself a bit but have 5 points anyway.

Hey big spender!
We generally have a spending wisely policy here but you can expense up to £100 on anything reasonable.
You are spending wisely, aren't you?

You've made quite a bit of money there, great job!
We hope you didn't come about it through foul means though.

missions.name: collector
missions.displayName: collect and carry more than £100 worth of valuables

reward.successMessage:
You've collected quite a lot of valuable stuff there!
Have you considered selling any of it?

missions.name: pickpocket
missions.displayName: steal more than £50 worth of valuables

reward.successMessage:
Yeah...
...about all that money you've made.
That level of dishonesty will get you fired pretty much immediately.

missions.name: latte
missions.description: It's your first day in the office. Head to the kitchen and get yourself off to a good start with a nice latte.

reward.successMessage:
Congratulations, you managed to get your latte.
If you've not done so already, now might be a good time to save your achievements so far.

name: atrium-seating
description:
You're in the atrium seating area.
People occasionally wander in and out of here, sit, chat, play chess, work etc.
It's quite a pleasant space dominated by a very large potted tree.

inventory.name: tree
inventory.detailedDescription:
It's an ornamental evergreen variety.
The twisted trunks spiral up about 25 feet into a carefully manicured crown of green.

inventory.name: chess set
inventory.detailedDescription: It's a cheapish generic wooden chess set.

inventory.name: lawyer door
inventory.detailedDescription: Peering through the window you see serious people in suits looking busy and important.

inventory.name: chair
inventory.detailedDescription: You expect to find Morpheus sitting in it. It's surprisingly comfortable.

inventory.name: key
inventory.detailedDescription: It doesn't look familiar.

inventory.name: cake
inventory.detailedDescription:
Mmmm tasty and healthy. It really is cake - no lie!
If only there were more.

name: bike-ambulance
description:
You're standing in the west car park by the bike ambulance.
Rick that works here is your man to fix broken bikes when they need some loving.

inventory.name: bike ambulance
inventory.detailedDescription: It's an old converted NHS ambulance. It's pretty beaten-up but looks functional.

inventory.name: rick
inventory.detailedDescription: He's a generous and friendly chap. Bikes is his thing.

missions.name: collectchrisbike
missions.description: Chris booked his bike in for repairs, you'll need to give Chris' bike to Rick.

reward.successMessage:
You hand Chris' bike over to Rick.
'Cheers' he says.
'I'll stash this away for now and let Chris know when it's done.'
Nice one! Helping people out feels good, doesn't it.

name: buenosaires
description:
You're in the Buenos Aires interview room.
Despite containing all the things you'd expect of an interview room, it still manages to feel empty and clinical.

inventory.name: wall
inventory.detailedDescription: Sparse, clinical and white.

inventory.name: whiteboard
inventory.detailedDescription: Despite regular cleaning, there's stil faint marks from long-disused whiteboard coding exercises and architecture diagrams.

inventory.name: flipchart
inventory.detailedDescription: It's just a regular flipchart.

inventory.name: pen
inventory.detailedDescription: Not great quality but it's a blue pen.

inventory.name: table
inventory.detailedDescription: It's a standard wood-effect office desk/table.

inventory.name: chairs
inventory.detailedDescription: They're just standard office meeting room chairs.

name: camelids-a
description:
You're in Camelids-A. The UX team have filled the walls with post-it notes.
The table feels slightly too large for the room and it's a bit cramped in here.

inventory.name: table
inventory.detailedDescription:
Pretty standard office furniture.
It's been crammed in to provide plenty of desktop working space for a large group of creative people but it's a bit of a squeeze to fit in here.

inventory.name: notes
inventory.detailedDescription: You skim the dozens of post-its on the walls. Most contain phrases that are meaningless to you such as 'user journey', 'top of funnel analysis' etc.

attributes.extendedInventoryDescription: Amongst the jargon you find $inventory that you have a particular affinity for.

inventory.name: post-it
inventory.detailedDescription:
A note you found stuck to the wall.
You find it highly amusing. Someone else might appreciate the humour of it too.

name: camelids-b
description:
When not in use for small meetings, this room doubles as an in-office hairdressing salon.
The carpet in here feels strange underfoot.

inventory.name: carpet
inventory.detailedDescription: On the surface it's just a plain office carpet but it's a bit prickly.

inventory.name: hair
inventory.detailedDescription:
Fine hair trimmings of assorted colours and thickness.
None look long enough to do anything useful with.

attributes.defaultResult: They're too fine and embedded into the carpet to collect.

name: core-area-east
description: You're in the CORE (DevOps) area. From a quick scan of the walls and monitors it looks like things are running well here at the moment.

inventory.name: walls
inventory.description: a wall full of assorted project and team status information
inventory.detailedDescription: There's a bunch of graphs that go up and to the right. Everything must be great.

inventory.name: monitor
inventory.detailedDescription: It's cycling through web site statistics and error logs.

inventory.name: zara sheldrake
inventory.detailedDescription: Our one and only business analyst. She mostly works with the core team but is also one of our first-aiders.

inventory.name: first aid kit
inventory.detailedDescription: There's enough equipment in here to heal a few nasty wounds.

inventory.name: dene boulton
inventory.detailedDescription: CORE team tester and specialist in the art of looking grumpy and happy at the same time.

missions.name: getchocolatefordene
missions.description: Dene's wants to warm up some chocolate.

dialogue:
'Hi $player.'
'I'm flat-out on the Salesforce project and will need to skip lunch.'
'You don't have any chocolate you can spare do you?'

dialogue.response: 'Thanks $player.'
'No worries. I'd really appreciate it if you could find some though.'
'Any joy finding that chocolate?'
'Excellent!'
'I won't ask again but I'd still appreciate some if you find any.'

reward.successMessage:
Dene tucks the bar of chocolate into the back pocket of his trousers and pats it happily.
'Ass warming!' he says and smiles. 'I hate cold chocolate.'
'Anyway, thanks $player. Much appreciated.'

name: core-area-west
description: You're in the CORE Project Management zone. The team have been battling the backlog of business requests and working their way to Cloud glory.

inventory.name: backlog
inventory.description: a scattering of analysis documentation but nothing interesting
inventory.detailedDescription: You pick through the few pieces of paperwork you can see lying around but there's nothing that particularly interests you.

attributes.defaultResult: I think Brian, Ben and Zara need those, sorry.

name: creative-agency-area
description: You're in the Agency Den. There's a tang of creativity (or is that printer toner?) in the air and the sound of clicks being converted to cash.

exits.description:
You crawl into the small hole under Dave's desk and find yourself briefly plunged into darkness.
After a second or so of vertigo you come to your senses somewhere outside.

inventory.name: desk
inventory.detailedDescription: On first glimpse, it's a standard wood-effect office desk but you feel an overwhelming urge to do a double-take.

linkedexits.description:
You crawl into the small hole under Dave's desk and find yourself briefly plunged into darkness.
After a second or so of vertigo you come to your senses somewhere outside.

inventory.name: tears
inventory.detailedDescription:
They're the residue of tears of frustration - probably from years of dealing with email marketing campaigns.
Nobody should have to work with email marketing for that long and be expected to stay entirely sane.

attributes.defaultResult: Trust me, you don't want them.
attributes.smell: You vaguely sense a tang of salt and blood around them.
attributes.sound: Wow, that's disturbing. It takes quite a spiritual imprint to leave the sound of tears.

inventory.name: spam
inventory.detailedDescription:
It's a leftover from a training course a few years ago. It says 'best before end: November 2015.
I thought this stuff lasted forever!

attributes.smell: You wonder to yourself if cats like Spam.

inventory.name: air
inventory.detailedDescription: There's something uplifting about it.

attributes.defaultResult: It's just a smell, not something you can keep - except in your memory and imagination.
attributes.smell:
Sharpies. You can smell sharpies.
Sharpies smell of ideas!

inventory.name: clicks
inventory.detailedDescription: Even when there's nobody here the clicks keep coming.

attributes.defaultResult: If you listen, you might just get it.

name: customer-delight-central
description:
You're in the Customer Delight team area - a large, open-plan office space.
From where you're standing, the most dominant feature in the room is a floor-to-ceiling glass wall decorated with LED lights.

inventory.name: wall
inventory.description: glass wall full of LED lights
inventory.detailedDescription: The lights are green! The product builds are all in great shape and tests are passing. What joy!

inventory.name: chris george
inventory.detailedDescription: Our resident head of Test.

inventory.name: mark wightman
inventory.detailedDescription: Our head of Development.

missions.name: partytime
missions.description: Mark wants to organise a celebration

dialogue:
'Hi $player. That's quite a first day you've had!'
'I think it's time to celebrate. When you're ready, come and talk to me again and we'll get something organised.'
Are you ready to go?

dialogue.response:
'Right, let's get this party sorted!'
'I've ordered a bus. Give me one last shout when you're ready to round everyone up!'
'OK. Give me a shout when you are.'

locations.name: bus
locations.description: You're on the party bus! Check in with Mark Wightman if you've not done so already and then round everyone up here.

missions.name: partybus
missions.displayName: get everyone on the party bus
missions.description: You did a great job of saving the company. Let's celebrate. Get everyone onto the party bus before it leaves!

dialogue:
'Hi $player.'
'Thanks for the amazing job saving everyone.'
'I think it's time we all had a break.'
'There's a bus waiting outside to take everyone off to celebrate and unwind after the day we've had.'
'Can you ask as many people as possible to go to the bus as soon as they can and then wait for the rest there?'
'Once we have a dozen or so partygoers (including yourself), it'll be time to relax.'
'Hey $player. How's the party organising going?'

reward.successMessage: Congratulations. You managed to get the bus loaded and ready to party. That's quite a feat!
reward.failMessage:
Oh no! The party bus is leaving and you haven't got enough people on board!
Well that's your crowning glory failed. What else is left to do?

inventory.name: jeff foster
inventory.detailedDescription: Our head of Software Engineering.

inventory.name: simon cromarty
inventory.detailedDescription: Our head of Project Management.

name: customer-delight-east
description:
You're at the Eastern entrance of the Customer Delight team area.
To the West you can see a glass wall with LED build status lights. You feel somewhat drawn to their glow.

name: customer-delight-management-area
description:
You're in the dead-zone of Customer Delight between the glass wall and Jellyfish.
There's a vacuum where the CEO and PA's used to sit although it's adequately filled by the presence of James Dening when he's around.

inventory.name: brian harris
inventory.detailedDescription:
Our head of Tech Comm's.
He has a pathologic aversion to misplaced apostrophe’s (can you see what I did here?); He's also the ghost-writer for all the Feel-Good-Fund invitations.

missions.name: findbriansguardian
missions.description: Brian wants to do the crossword.

dialogue:
'Hi $player.'
'I seem to have mislaid my copy of The Guardian.'
'I've not done my daily cryptic crossword and feel like I'm getting withdrawal symptoms.'
'If you see one around can you bring me a copy?'

dialogue.response: 'Thanks $player. I think It's probably somewhere on the second floor.'
'Well, when you feel like being helpful, let me know.'
'Keep an eye out for it if you can.'
'Hey $player. Any sign of that newspaper?'
'Have you found my newspaper yet?'
'Excellent!'
'I won't ask again but I'd appreciate it if you can help.'

reward.successMessage:
Brian says 'Thanks $player.'
'I was starting to get the shakes.'
'I can work happily now.

inventory.name: james dening
inventory.detailedDescription: Our head of Sales. Like a 6-foot-plus tigger.

inventory.name: wig
inventory.detailedDescription: A disturbing remnant from the sales team beating their records and making their management team wear fancy dress.

inventory.name: maracas
inventory.detailedDescription: A reminder of one of our great days out and of Chris Whitworth's musical talents.

attributes.defaultResult: They're really annoying. Please don't do that again.

inventory.name: alan platt
inventory.detailedDescription: The master of Customer Delight.

name: customer-delight-north
description: You're in the Northern part of the Customer Delight team area.

name: customer-delight-south
description: You're in the Southern part of the Customer Delight team area.

inventory.name: chris whitworth
inventory.detailedDescription: Great developer, exceptional musician. Part of our customer delight development team.

missions.name: destroymaracas
missions.description: Chris gave James something really annoying.

dialogue:
'Hi $player.'
'I think I made a terrible mistake.'
'After the last Red Gate day out I offered a prize to whoever could guess the full list of samples used in one of my tracks.'
'Unfortunately for all of us, James Dening won.'
'Now in addition to his boundless positivity he's liable to shake his maracas at people.'
'Can you get hold of them and quietly destroy them whilst nobody's looking?'

reward.successMessage: OK, so it wasn't the nicest thing to do to James but at least you've preserved Chris' sanity for a while.

name: customer-delight-south-east
description:
You're in the South-Eastern corner of the Customer Delight team area.
This is the home of the SQL Source Control development team.

name: customer-delight-south-west
description: You're in the South-West corner of the Customer Delight team area.

inventory.name: jonathan watts
inventory.detailedDescription: Self-confessed Eeyore. Kick-ass tester and PM.

inventory.name: alice easey
inventory.detailedDescription:
A source of endless positivity, even when the world is falling apart.
Probably your best best for survival in a zombie apocalypse.

inventory.name: vial
inventory.detailedDescription: A small glass vial. The type used to carry medical samples.

inventory.name: first aid kit
inventory.detailedDescription: There's enough equipment in here to heal a few nasty wounds.

inventory.name: food rations
inventory.detailedDescription: A few days worth of rather dull but long-lasting dried food.

inventory.name: survival book
inventory.detailedDescription: Tips and tricks for survival in a zombie apocalypse.

missions.name: survivezombies
missions.displayName: learn how to survive a zombie apocalypse
missions.description:
Most zombie contagion is spread through biting. Those afflicted with zombieism are likely to lose control of their normal behaviours however there is hope.
If you are able to find and consume a source of zombieism antibodies it is possible to develop some level of immunity.

Furthermore, any carrier of zombie antibodies who is subsequently bitten may transfer those antibodies to their attacker.
Thus speed is of the essence, it is important to rapidly identify patient zero and all who have come into contact with them in order to pass on immunity and limit the contagion.
Be warned though that this approach is not guaranteed. Ensure you have sufficient food and medical supplies and under no circumstances should you engage in direct combat as you risk working the afflicted into a dangerous frenzy.

reward.successMessage: I'm sure you'll never need to know any of this, right?

inventory.name: chris moore
inventory.detailedDescription: Endlessly cheerful security guru extraordinaire. Keep him away from Rum and pub floors.

missions.name: fixchrisbike
missions.description: Chris wants his bike fixed.

dialogue:
'Hi $player.'
'I've just got a new bike but it's not set up properly.'
'I've booked it in for repairs but I'm flat-out all day today.'
'Could you do me a favour and take it for a service?'
'You'll need to search through the racks for it I'm afraid.'
'Oops. You'll need the key. Here you go.'

delivers.name: bike key
delivers.detailedDescription: You'll need this to shift Chris' bike.

reward.successMessage: Chris hands you a bike key.

name: customer-delight-west
description:
You're at the West end of the Customer Delight team area. Also know as 'User Experience Alley'.
This is where most of our UX staff in customer delight sit as it's right between all the development teams. There's a window to the west that overlooks one of the car parks.

inventory.name: tomato plants
inventory.detailedDescription: They're huge! But they're also rather dry and starting to wilt.

delivers.name: tomato plants
delivers.detailedDescription: They're well watered and fruiting.

inventory.name: tomatoes
inventory.detailedDescription: They're ripe and ready to pick.

attributes.defaultResult:
You'll need to ask Filippa if you want her tomatoes.
If you wait around long enough, I'm sure she'll be back.

inventory.name: filippa vajda
inventory.detailedDescription: Roaming UX redhead.

missions.name: waterfilsplants
missions.description: Filippa wants her tomato plants watered.

dialogue:
'Hi $player.'
'I'm running UX calls all day today. Would you be able to help me out and water my tomato plants?'

dialogue.response: 'Thanks $player. They're on the window ledge near my desk.'
'Thanks for nothing then.'
'I'd really appreciate it if you can.'
'I know who my friends are, don't worry about me.'
'Have you been able to sort out my tomatoes yet?'
'Excellent!'
'I won't ask again but I'd appreciate it if you can help.'

reward.successMessage:
Great job! I'm sure Filippa will be really pleased.
There's a chance these might be useful later.
reward.failMessage: I know you're busy but a little help never hurt anyone you know.

inventory.name: adam parker
inventory.detailedDescription: Master of user experience and a somewhat problematic addiction to stationery.

missions.name: findadamstrainers
missions.description: Adam soaked his feet.

dialogue:
'Hi $player.'
'I managed to get a soaking cycling into work this morning and can't find my spare trainers.'
'They're usually somewhere around my desk but they could be anywhere to be honest.'
'Could you do track them down and bring them back to me?'

dialogue.response: 'Thanks $player.'
'Well, I'll be around if you change your mind.'
'Keep an eye out for them if you can.'
'Hey $player. Any joy tracking my trainers down?'
'Have you found my trainers yet?'
'Excellent!'
'I won't ask again but I'd appreciate it if you can help.'

reward.successMessage:
Adam says 'Thanks $player.'
'I'm pretty sure nobody wanted to have to deal with me getting trench foot.'

name: darth-vader
description:
You're in the 'Darth Vader' meeting room. Another great space tucked out of the way behind facilities this time.
There's a great view up the road out of the business park.

name: east-bike-racks
description: You're standing at the South-East corner of the the office building.

inventory.name: bike racks
inventory.detailedDescription: There's dozens of bikes here. Are you looking for any in particular?

inventory.name: bike
inventory.detailedDescription: It looks like Chris' new bike.

attributes.defaultResult:
You hop on the bike and pedal it around for a while.
It's probably best not to get caught on it.

name: east-car-park
description:
You're standing in the East car park. In the far corner you can see an area used for waste storage.
To the South are bike racks and a path running across the back of the Red Gate office building.

name: east-corridor-ground-floor
description: You're in the East corridor of the ground floor.

name: east-corridor-ground-floor-north-east
description: You're at the North end of the ground floor East corridor.

name: east-corridor-ground-floor-north-west
description: You're standing in a short corridor just outside the post room.

name: east-end-south-corridor-ground-floor
description: You're near the East end of the South corridor on the ground floor.

inventory.name: door
inventory.detailedDescription: If you open the door, you'll probably set off an alarm.

name: east-south-end-corridor-ground-floor
description: You're near the South end of the East corridor on the ground floor.

name: enterprise-meeting-room
description: You're in the Enterprise meeting room. You peer through the window at the people coming and going from the office.

name: facilities-area
description: You're in the Facilities team area. They work tirelessly to keep the building running, clean, safe and maintained. Just don't annoy them, you'll regret it.

name: finance-area
description: You're in the Finance team area. You really need to be nice to this lot. They sort out your pay and expenses as well as all the rest of the cash running through this place.

inventory.name: black book
inventory.detailedDescription: This one's a bit of an eye-opener about the challenges of theft in offices.

missions.name: learntosteal
missions.description:
In any office environment you must exercise caution. Even trusted colleagues may be less scrupulous than you think, don't be a victim and above all, keep your money hidden.
It appears less scrupulous players might be tempted to steal from their colleagues!

reward.successMessage: Interesting. You've learned some new stealth skills. Best use them wisely.

name: first-floor-back-stairs-east
description: You're standing on the north-east staircase.

name: first-floor-back-stairs-west
description: You're halfway up the west fire escape staircase.

name: first-floor-cubby-hole
description:
You're in the First floor cubby hole.
The area is lined with whiteboards and there are assorted chairs and bean bags scattered around.

inventory.name: beanbag
inventory.detailedDescription: Very comfy. Not so easy to get out of once you're in place though

name: first-floor-cubicle
description:
You're in a first floor toilet cubicle.
The toilet is still refilling from a previous flush. You might need to hang around for a while if you plan on using this one.

inventory.name: floor
inventory.detailedDescription: Shiny and clean.

attributes.defaultResult:
As you undo your trousers and squat, you consider the implication of your actions and decide you don't feel like being sacked today.
Repeat after me, 'I am not the phantom pooper.'
Time to tidy yourself up and learn to behave like a reasonable person.

inventory.name: cubicle door
inventory.detailedDescription: When you're finished...

inventory.name: toilet
inventory.detailedDescription: Pretty much your standard office porcelain.

attributes.defaultResult: You try a test-flush on the toilet before use but it just seems to be constantly refilling and not enough water for a proper flush. It's probably best to use another one.

inventory.name: brush
inventory.detailedDescription:
Be nice and clean up after yourself when you're done.
This one looks like it's been used recently (yum!)

inventory.name: article on software security
inventory.detailedDescription: It's entitled 'Take security in your STRIDE'.

missions.name: lotleasteregg
missions.description: Hmmm Interesting. It's available online.

reward.successMessage: Congratulations. You've learned a basic mnemonic for considering software security.

name: first-floor-fire-escape
description:
You're standing on the first floor of the rear fire escape. You probably shouldn't be here without a good reason.
The wind howls across the steel deck. Peering cautiously down over the railings you can see the smoking area and bike racks.

name: first-floor-landing-central
description: You're on the first floor landing.

name: first-floor-landing-east
description:
You're at the East end of the first floor landing.
Through the window to the East you can see some of the sales team relaxing and playing on an XBox.

inventory.name: office door
inventory.detailedDescription: One of the main doors into the first floor working area.

name: first-floor-landing-west
description:
You're at the West end of the first floor landing.
Peering over the balcony you see people wandering about their business down below.

name: first-floor-toilet
description:
You're in the first floor toilet.
It's a lot like all the others here although there's a subtle difference in colour.

inventory.name: mirror
inventory.detailedDescription: You peer closely at yourself in the mirror and wonder if perhaps the Red Gate diet is getting to you a little.

inventory.name: cubicle door
inventory.detailedDescription: When you need to go...

inventory.name: soap
inventory.detailedDescription: After careful inspection, you figure out where to push it to make it work.

attributes.defaultResult: You push the top of the dispenser. With a little bit of slipping and repositioning you manage to lather and wash your hands.

inventory.name: basin
inventory.detailedDescription: Clean and with a supply of fresh water.

attributes.defaultResult: You rinse your face and hands in the sink. You feel clean and refreshed.

delivers.name: water
delivers.detailedDescription: No real nutritional value but great for plants.

delivers.name: tomato plants
delivers.detailedDescription: They're well watered and fruiting.

inventory.name: tomatoes
inventory.detailedDescription: They're ripe and ready to pick.

attributes.defaultResult:
You'll need to ask Filippa if you want her tomatoes.
If you wait around long enough, I'm sure she'll be back.

name: fishing
description:
You're in the Fishing meeting room. Now you really know how a goldfish feels.
You feel you're being watched.

name: flowers-a
description:
You're in the Flowers A meeting room. It's bright & airy in here.
If you want to use the AV equipment, forget it. Use the TV instead.

name: flowers-b
description: You're in the Flowers B meeting room. This is a great medium-sized room that often gets overlooked. Possibly because it's regularly closed off to be used for massages.

name: graffiti-a
description: You're in the Graffiti-A meeting room. The decor is amazing but there's very little natural light.

name: graffiti-b
description: You're in the Graffiti-B meeting room. It's all bright and shiny.

inventory.name: torch
inventory.detailedDescription:
'10,000 candle power' apparently.
How do they calculate these things?
What sort of candle are they comparing it to?
Anyway, it's certainly bright enough to to find your way around here.

inventory.name: batteries
inventory.detailedDescription: Shine a light on the world.

attributes.chargesDescription: There's enough for about $charges $chargeUnit of power

name: ground-floor-back-stair-east
description:
You're standing at the bottom of the north-east staircase.
There's an air of foreboding down here. People don't come down here very often unless they're lost.

name: ground-floor-back-stairs-west
description: You're in the bottom of the west fire escape stairs.

inventory.name: key
inventory.detailedDescription: It unlocks coffee machines.

name: ground-floor-cubicle
description: You're standing in a nice clean toilet cubicle. Fortunately the previous occupant remembered to flush.

inventory.name: floor
inventory.detailedDescription: Shiny and clean.

attributes.defaultResult:
As you undo your trousers and squat, you consider the implication of your actions and decide you don't feel like being sacked today.
Repeat after me, 'I am not the phantom pooper.'
Time to tidy yourself up and learn to behave like a reasonable person.

inventory.name: cubicle door
inventory.detailedDescription: When you're finished...

inventory.name: toilet
inventory.detailedDescription: It looks like it's in lovely clean, working order!

attributes.defaultResult:
You relieve yourself and give the toilet a rather satisfying flush.
You gaze at the water as it gently gushes into the u-bend and drift into a peaceful, calm place...

...You jolt back to your senses and remember you have work to do. Time to get going $player!

inventory.name: article on solid design principles
inventory.detailedDescription:
It's entitled 'Do Me a SOLID' (that's a terrible pun for an article in a toilet, right?)
and describes SOLID coding principles (something this game doesn't always adhere to very well).

missions.name: lotleasteregg
missions.description: Hmmm Interesting. It's available online.

reward.successMessage: Congratulations. You've learned the basics on how to develop good software architecture.

name: ground-floor-fire-escape
description:
You're at the bottom of the rear fire escape staircase.
All around you are large gas and water pipes leading in and out of the building.
This area is occasionally used for storing tools.

inventory.name: pipe
inventory.detailedDescription:
They're painted bright yellow and blue.
They look pretty much indestructible (which I'm sure you'll agree is a good thing).

inventory.name: whetstone
inventory.detailedDescription: Every text adventure needs a whetstone right?

attributes.chargesDescription: It's pretty worn out. There's enough of it left to sharpen about $charges $chargeUnit

inventory.name: rag
inventory.detailedDescription: It's slightly damp but handling it makes your hands feel oddly dry.

attributes.smell: It smells of polish and solvents.

inventory.name: door
inventory.detailedDescription: It only opens from this side. This has the potential to be a useful short-cut.

name: ground-floor-toilet
description:
You stare at yourself in the bathroom mirror and muse over the form and design of the soap dispensers.
It's probably not socially acceptable to hang around in here all day though.

inventory.name: mirror
inventory.detailedDescription: You peer closely at yourself in the mirror and wonder if perhaps the Red Gate diet is getting to you a little.

inventory.name: hand dryer
inventory.detailedDescription: These dryers are good but loud.

attributes.defaultResult:
You wave your hands under the dryer. After a while it cuts out automatically but at least your hands seem mostly dry.
You wonder how someone would be able to dry their face with one of these and reminisce about the days of 'real' paper towels.

inventory.name: cubicle door
inventory.detailedDescription: When you need to go...

inventory.name: soap
inventory.detailedDescription: After careful inspection, you figure out where to push it to make it work.

attributes.defaultResult: That's annoying. It looks like all the soap in this bathroom has run out.

inventory.name: basin
inventory.detailedDescription: Clean and with a supply of fresh water.

attributes.defaultResult:
You rinse your hands in the basin and ponder on where all the water in this place comes from and goes to.
Hmmm.

delivers.name: water
delivers.detailedDescription: No real nutritional value but great for plants.

delivers.name: tomato plants
delivers.detailedDescription: They're well watered and fruiting.

inventory.name: tomatoes
inventory.detailedDescription: They're ripe and ready to pick.

attributes.defaultResult:
You'll need to ask Filippa if you want her tomatoes.
If you wait around long enough, I'm sure she'll be back.

name: incidentals-blinkpipe
description: You're in the space between Core and Finance occupied by the Blinkpipe team. Some of them look oddly familiar although you rarely actually come into contact with them.

name: is-area
description: You're in the IS area. The team here keep this show on the road. Anything you need, they can usually get it or fix it for you.

inventory.name: amanda mansfield
inventory.detailedDescription: It's well-worth helping her out, you never know when you'll need her support.

missions.name: teachprojectorrepair
missions.description: Amanda knows how to fix stuff.

dialogue:
'Hi $player.'
'I don't suppose you could fix the projector in Poppy for me could you?'
'It's pretty simple, here's a bulb. You'll need to do a bit of a repair on it as well though.'

'Hi again $player.'
Any joy with the projector?

delivers.name: bulb
delivers.detailedDescription: A critical part of a projector. It's fragile, don't drop it!

reward.successMessage: Amanda hands you a projector bulb.

name: jellyfish-meeting-room
description:
You're in Jellyfish meeting room. The carpet in here is a rather vivid green.
Through the window to the north you can see people scurrying up and down the stairs trying not to spill their coffee.

name: kitchen-ground-floor
description: You're in the atrium kitchen.

inventory.name: bottle
inventory.detailedDescription: A large milk bottle

inventory.name: milk
inventory.detailedDescription: Enough for a few lattes.

attributes.chargesDescription: There's enough here for $charges $chargeUnit of coffee

delivers.name: white coffee
delivers.detailedDescription: Milky development fuel

inventory.name: cup
inventory.detailedDescription: Just the right size for a decent brew.

inventory.name: coco pops
inventory.detailedDescription: They're going a bit soggy but still tasty.

inventory.name: sugar
inventory.detailedDescription: Not so good for the waistline but sugary, sweet and tasty.

attributes.combinesDescription: Don't waste it all, you'll need this as a sweetener

delivers.name: sweet coffee
delivers.detailedDescription: Development fuel with added sugar!

delivers.name: sweet latte
delivers.detailedDescription: Hipster Development fuel with added sugar!

delivers.name: sweet mocha
delivers.detailedDescription: Chocolatey hipster development fuel with added sugar!

inventory.name: coffee machine
inventory.detailedDescription: Given the right ingredients it makes a variety of coffees.

delivers.name: latte
delivers.detailedDescription: Development fuel for former hipsters.

delivers.name: sweet latte
delivers.detailedDescription: Hipster Development fuel with added sugar!

delivers.name: mocha
delivers.detailedDescription: Coffee and chocolate. What a combination!

delivers.name: sweet mocha
delivers.detailedDescription: Chocolatey hipster development fuel with added sugar!

delivers.name: coffee
delivers.detailedDescription: Development fuel.

delivers.name: sweet coffee
delivers.detailedDescription: Development fuel with added sugar!

delivers.name: white coffee
delivers.detailedDescription: Milky development fuel

missions.name: destroycoffeemachine
missions.description: This place thrives on coffee, don't ruin it.

reward.successMessage:
Wow, that was foolish. You've just made yourself one of the least popular people in the building.
You lose 100 points (and good luck getting help from anyone now!)

missions.name: beans
missions.displayName: fill the coffee machine with beans
missions.description: Before you can get any coffee, this machine needs beans.

reward.successMessage: Congratulations, you got the coffee machine working!

locations.name: crash-site
locations.description:
You're standing near the West car park.
It looks like a scene out of a disaster movie.
There's debris everywhere and a smell of burning plastic, aviation fuel and barbecues.
From somwhere in the wreckage of what was once a small plane you can hear a low moan.

inventory.name: wreckage
inventory.detailedDescription: A tangle of twisted, smouldering metal, plastic, brokenglass and bodies.

attributes.smell: It's going to linger in your nose and memories for quite some time.

inventory.name: pool
inventory.detailedDescription: It looks like something was injured here. It's worth collecting some, chances are it might save lives.

inventory.name: comic
inventory.detailedDescription:
It looks like the tattered and charred remnants of a very rare comic book.
It could be a clue.

inventory.name: dave convery
inventory.detailedDescription:
Like a cynical but gentle, marketing wolverine.
He runs a regular podcast on comics (along with Roger and Lucy).

inventory.name: roger hart
inventory.detailedDescription:
If you've ever seen Withnail and I; think 'Uncle Monty' but somewhat more dashing and a whole lot more 'wrong'.
He runs a regular podcast on comics (along with Dave and Lucy)

inventory.name: jordan miller
inventory.detailedDescription: Odd. Nobody seems to recognise him. Maybe he's new too?

inventory.name: emergency first aid kit
inventory.detailedDescription: A one-off emergency first-aid kit.

missions.name: killthespy
missions.description: I'm sure he wasn't around before the crash!

reward.successMessage: Congratulations. Jordan (the spy) is dead! Let's hope that's the end of all our troubles.

missions.name: stealsketchbook
missions.description: Steal Simon Galbraith's A3 sketchbook.

dialogue:
'Psst!'
'I've got some covert jobs if you're interested.'
'If you can steal Simon Galbraith's sketchbook and bring it to me (or mug him if it's easier), I'll make it worth your while.'
'How's that little job going?'

reward.successMessage:
Jordan says 'Nice work!'
'Here's £50.'
'Head back to the Atrium and keep low for a while.'
'You'll know when it's time to track me down for another chat.'

missions.name: vanarrival
missions.description: Steal £100 worth of valuables from the company.

dialogue:
'I knew I could rely on you.'
'I've parked a van around the side of the office.'
'If you can load it up with over £100 worth of valuables, I'll double your money.'

locations.name: east-car-park-corner
locations.description:
You're standing by a medium-sized non-descript white delivery van.
It seems odd to be parked around the side here. Usually we receive deliveries around the front.

inventory.name: van
inventory.detailedDescription: It's a generic tatty old white van. It's had quite a few knocks and scrapes in its time.

missions.name: stealvaluables
missions.description: Steal £100 worth of valuables from the company.

modifyLocation.name: east-car-park-corner
modifyLocation.description: You're standing in the corner of the East car park. On the ground are the tyre tracks of a large vehicle that appears to have left in a hurry. Given the noise it made as it left, I'd disappear from here quickly if I were you.

inventory.name: tyre tracks
inventory.detailedDescription: They're too scuffed to see any clear tread marks but they're wide enough to be consistent with a medium-sized goods vehicle.

inventory.name: mouse
inventory.detailedDescription: It looks like a house mouse. I wonder what it's doing here.

reward.successMessage:
As you load up the van with the last of the valuables you see an envelope full of cash.
On the front it just says '$player'.
You hastily pocket the money and try not to look suspicious.

As you turn to leave, a masked man dives out of the bushes nearby jumps into the driver's seat and roars off in the van, tyres squealing.
It's probably wise for you to make yourself scarce for a while.

reward.eventMessage:
You hear a low droning noise followed by a loud explosion somewhere to the North-West.
Something bad has happened outside!
Now's probably a good time to save your game again if you haven't done so recently.

name: lawyer-lobby
description:
You're in the lobby of the resident law firm.
There's an air of bureaucracy, suits and books to the place.

name: library
description:
You're in the atrium library.
This is a comfortable area to browse our bookshelves full of the wonders of working with software.

inventory.name: table
inventory.detailedDescription:
It's custom-made with a fake rock underneath and a sword-sized slot in the top.
A plaque on it says something about a billion dollars.

inventory.name: bookcase
inventory.detailedDescription: Books on everything from travel to SQL server and from sales to C#.

attributes.extendedInventoryDescription: Amongst the hundreds of pages of reading material available you find $inventory that may be of interest.

inventory.name: large book
inventory.detailedDescription: It's a book on how to sell software in a friendly way.

inventory.name: coffee machine book
inventory.description: maintenance manual for the coffee machines
inventory.detailedDescription: It includes schematics and wiring diagrams for how to repair and maintain coffee machines.

missions.name: repaircoffeemachine
missions.description:
Blah blah blah wiring blah locks blah coffee blah beans blah milk blah.
Did you know you can use the verbs repair and break?
If something is broken try repairing it. A combination of the two actions may sometimes be a faster route to some of your goals.
Try this out on the coffee machine. (Just don't get caught breaking stuff deliberately).

reward.successMessage: Congratulations. You've learned how to repair a coffee machine.

inventory.name: small book
inventory.detailedDescription:
It's a book on why not all customers are created equal.
I think it's meant to help you work with difficult customers.
This kind of thing is perfect for someone in a customer-facing role.

inventory.name: sword
inventory.detailedDescription: It's flimsy and fake-looking but kind of fun.

inventory.name: guitar
inventory.detailedDescription: The strings are a bit tatty but it's mostly in tune.

attributes.defaultResult: You attempt to strum a few notes but virtual music doesn't seem to be your forte.

name: lift-first-floor
description:
A metallic voice says 'First floor; Doors opening'.
You're in a lift on the first floor.
The cool blue-white of the LED lighting gives you a somewhat sickened pallor in the full mirror.
You try not to keep staring at yourself

name: lift-ground-floor
description:
The lift doors automatically close behind you. You're in the ground floor lift. It's quite dark in here and every now and again a disembodied voice chants something about electrical faults.
You contemplate pressing the alarm button but it'll only route to a call centre somewhere.

inventory.name: alarm button
inventory.detailedDescription: It doesn't look like it's been used in quite some time.

attributes.defaultResult:
You hold the button for 3 seconds.
After a minute or two of ringing, a distorted voice crackles through the speaker. '~crackle... hello lift service, can I hel... ~crackle' and then dies out.
It looks like that service hasn't been tested in a while.
Let's hope you don't ever need it.

inventory.name: exit button
inventory.detailedDescription: If you push the exit, you should be able to get out again.

name: lift-second-floor
description:
Ding. Second floor.
Same lift, same mirror, same eerie lighting. Or is it?

name: machine-room-east
description: Now you're definitely in a sensitive area. Racks of servers hum away. Fortunately most of them are just for testing, we use the cloud you know!

name: machine-room-west
description:
You're in the IS storage area.
You're not meant to be in here unaccompanied I think. There are cables, wires, tools and spare pieces of hardware arrayed around you.

inventory.name: screwdriver
inventory.detailedDescription: Not much use for working on electronics but I'm sure it has other uses.

name: marketing
description: You're in the Marketing area.

name: mercedes
description: You're in the Mercedes meeting room. An odd-shaped room that's rarely used by any but the locals.

name: northwest-corridor-ground-floor
description: You're in the West corridor of the ground floor.

name: office-front
description:
You're standing outside the front of the Red Gate offices. The sun is shining and the business park security and maintenance crews are all busy doing their regular rounds.
There are car parks to both the East and West. To the north is the main road that runs through the estate.

inventory.name: ice cream man
inventory.detailedDescription: A random guy who occasionally has ice cream for sale.

sells.name: ice cream
sells.detailedDescription: Ice cream makes a great gift!

missions.name: freeicecream
missions.description: The Ice cream man wants to give you a free sample.

dialogue:
'Hi $player.'
'Would you like an ice cream?'

dialogue.response: 'Here you go!'
'Never mind.'
'Maybe later then?'
'How about that ice cream now?'

delivers.name: ice cream
delivers.detailedDescription: Ice cream makes a great gift!

reward.successMessage:
You accepted a free ice cream, that was smart.
If only everything in life were this easy.
reward.failMessage:
Too bad. A free ice cream might have been useful.
Ah well, on with the work.

name: opportunities-cubbyhole
description: You're in a dead-end room full of clutter in the opportunities and ventures area.

inventory.name: nerf gun
inventory.detailedDescription: An unlucky shot with this could take someone's eye out.

inventory.name: dart
inventory.detailedDescription: Ping, squeee, ouch, grrr.

inventory.name: drums
inventory.detailedDescription: An electronic drum kit, cool!

attributes.defaultResult: You bash the drums for a while. Your sense of rhythm feels a bit off today.

name: opportunities-north
description: You're in north end of the opportunities and ventures area.

inventory.name: james moore
inventory.detailedDescription: He pwns the Opportunities division.

name: opportunities-north-corridor
description: You're in a corridor at the north end of the opportunities and ventures area.

name: opportunities-north-east-corridor
description: You're at the end of a corridor in the northern part of the opportunities and ventures area.

name: opportunities-south
description: You're in south end of the opportunities and ventures area.

inventory.name: lucy boyes
inventory.detailedDescription:
A key part of our world of wrong. Probably the most unlikely but capable PA to a CEO you'll ever meet.
She runs a regular podcast on comics (along with Roger and Dave)

inventory.name: axe
inventory.detailedDescription: I have no idea why a PA would carry such a dangerous weapon but I wouldn't mess with anyone carrying this.

missions.name: finddaveandroger
missions.displayName: find the rest of the podcast team.
missions.description: Lucy's trying to find Dave and Roger.

dialogue:
'Hi $player.'
'Dave and Roger are supposed to be flying back from a comic book convention today.'
'I don't suppose you've seen them around anywhere have you?'

dialogue.response: 'I hope they're ok. They sounded a bit rough last time I spoke to them.'

'Well. I hope they're ok. They sounded a bit rough last time I spoke to them.'
'Keep an eye out for them if you can.'

inventory.name: sara stopford-pickering
inventory.detailedDescription: One of our super-capable and friendly PA team.

inventory.name: google glasses
inventory.detailedDescription:
These are pretty hard to get hold of!
Wearing these makes you an instant hipster.

attributes.defaultResult:
Nah, they don't really suit you.
You take them off again and blink a few times to recover your near-field vision.

name: opportunities-west
description:
You're in West end of the opportunities and ventures area.
Peering through the window you see staff wandering past on their way to and from their bikes.

inventory.name: chris smith
inventory.detailedDescription: Project Manager and retrospective guru extraordinaire.

missions.name: facilitatethefacilitator
missions.description: Chris is due to run a workshop but needs some fresh stickies.

dialogue:
'Hi $player.'
'Can you give me a hand?'
'I'm running a workshop later today but I'm running low on post-it notes.'
'Could you bring me some from the stationary cupboard when you get a chance?'

dialogue.response: 'Great! I'll be somewhere around the office. Come and find me when you've got them.'
'Well if you manage to find any, track me down.'
'If you manage to find any, track me down. I'd really appreciate it.'
'Hey $player. Did you manage to find any stickies?'
'Awesome. Give me them when you can.'
'Well if you manage to find any, track me down.'
'It really would be a big help if you could find them.'

reward.successMessage:
Chris says 'Brilliant. Thanks for the help.'
Congratulations. You facilitated the facilitator!

name: paint-pots
description:
You're in the Paint Pots meeting room. The lack of visible light adds to the sense of foreboding.
You feel like this is a room specially reserved for difficult HR conversations. You'd be wrong of course!

inventory.name: people folder
inventory.detailedDescription: Leafing through the contents, it appears to be folder of notes on working effectively with others.

missions.name: workingwithothers
missions.description:
Whilst in the real world working relationships are not transactional, working well with others here is largely about give and take.
The more you give, the more help you can ask for.
Be aware however that your kind deeds won't be remembered forever.
Acts of violence or unwanted attention will not be tolerated.
Those in favour can ask a friend where someone else is. They may also be able to ask individuals or everyone to wait for them or to go to places.
Colleagues with exceptionally strong working relationships may even support you in times of danger and need.

reward.successMessage: It looks like you've picked up a few hints on how to work more effectively with those around you!

name: peacock
description: You're in the Peacock meeting room. Other than meetings, this room doubles as a miniature recording studio.

name: people-team-area
description: You're in the People Team area. For such an overworked group they're always available and happy to help.

name: people-team-north
description: You're on the Northern edge of the People Team area.

name: people-team-north-west
description: You're in the North-West corner of the People Team area.

name: people-team-water-cooler
description: You're stood by a water cooler on the west wing of the second floor. A corridor leads North and East. There are team areas to the South and meeting rooms to the West.

inventory.name: water cooler
inventory.detailedDescription: A supply of fresh, filtered and cooled drinking water.

delivers.name: water
delivers.detailedDescription: No real nutritional value but great for thirst and plants.

delivers.name: tomato plants
delivers.detailedDescription: They're well watered and fruiting.

inventory.name: tomatoes
inventory.detailedDescription: They're ripe and ready to pick.

attributes.defaultResult: You'll need to ask Filippa if you want her tomatoes.

name: pioneer
description: You're in the Pioneer meeting room. The acoustics in here seem very strange.

inventory.name: plain key
inventory.detailedDescription: Just a plain key.

name: poppy
description: You're in the Poppy meeting room. The AV equipment in here could use some love.

inventory.name: projector
inventory.detailedDescription: It makes that happy, warm humming sound that only an old projector can give you.

missions.name: repairprojector
missions.description: The projector's broken, someone needs to fix it.

reward.successMessage:
Great job! Next time there's a meeting in here, nobody will curse the previous occupants.
Curses can only lead to bad things!

inventory.name: simon galbraith
inventory.detailedDescription: He runs the show.

inventory.name: sketchbook
inventory.detailedDescription: It looks like it contains all Simon's plans.

missions.name: retrievedisk
missions.description: Retrieve a stolen hard drive.

dialogue:
'Hi $player, thanks for the amazing job saving us from disaster.'
'We have another serious problem. In the wake of the crash, someone's been stealing our data.'
'I believe the culprit is still in the area and hasn't been able to offload it to anyone.'
'Can you track it down and bring it back to me?'

dialogue.response:
'Thanks $player. I think there's a spy somewhere in the building.'
'Track them down and investivate the situation.'

Refusing a polite but important request from your CEO probably isn't wise.
'Well, when you're ready to do something useful, you know where I am.'
'Keep an eye out for suspicious activity and if you track down anything, I'm sure we can make it worth your while.'
'About that missing data...'
'Have you found my missing data yet?'
'Excellent, hand it over please.'
'Fine. I won't ask you again but the request still stands.'

reward.successMessage:
Simon says 'Amaaazing!' and waves his arms in a CEO-like gesture.
Congratulations. You retrieved the stolen hard drive! Have 50 points and a cash bonus.
'If you've not done so already, I think you should double-check to ensure our problematic friend gives us no more trouble. (if you get my gist).'
reward.failMessage:
That was foolish. The hard disk was worth a lot in the right hands.
Well. Best you move on and see if you can redeem yourself elsewhere.

name: post-room
description:
You're in the post room.
Dotted around the shelves and floor are parcels of all sizes.
One of the great things about this place is that the reception staff are willing to take deliveries for all staff.
It means most stuff in the post room is from Amazon or similar and Christmas is a bit crazy but it beats waiting at home for a delivery.

inventory.name: parcels
inventory.detailedDescription: Big, small, round, heavy, light. Parcels galore but none of them are yours.

attributes.defaultResult: They're not yours!

inventory.name: post
inventory.detailedDescription:
It's the traditional array of pigeon holes you see in any post room.
Funny how these have survived into the 21st century paperless office.

attributes.extendedInventoryDescription: Thumbing through the piles of uncollected letters, you find $inventory.

name: punts
description: You're in the Punts meeting room. It's probably the narrowest meeting room in the building. Just room for 2 and a PC.

name: reception
description: You're standing by the big red reception desk in the Red Gate office atrium.

inventory.name: desk
inventory.detailedDescription: It's big, it's red, it emits a bright friendly feeling to all newcomers to the building.

inventory.name: visitors book
inventory.detailedDescription: It looks like you're the first newcomer today.

attributes.defaultResult: It needs to stay down here on reception.

inventory.name: biro
inventory.detailedDescription:
It's like those pens you get in banks with a chain that's just a little bit too short to write with if you're left-handed.
Red Gate seems to have more left-handed people than a 'normal' office.
Perhaps there's something sinister going on.

attributes.defaultResult: It's attached to the desk.

inventory.name: vic wiseman
inventory.detailedDescription:
Well, receptionist is an understatement to be honest.
She looks out for everyone here. Be nice to her.

missions.name: talktovic
missions.description: Vic needs you to sign in.

dialogue:
'Good morning $player.'
'Welcome aboard!'

reward.successMessage: 'If you can just sign in here for the day we can sort you out with access to the remainder of the building.'

missions.name: vicsbook
missions.displayName: give Vic something interesting to read
missions.description: Vic has a parcel for you but she'd like something interesting to read first.

delivers.name: parcel
delivers.detailedDescription: It's got a sticker saying 'fragile' on it. Hopefully there's something useful inside.

inventory.name: bag
inventory.detailedDescription: The label says 'Finest Software Development Coffee Beans'

inventory.name: beans
inventory.detailedDescription: Development fuel. Almost enough to last a day here.

attributes.chargesDescription: There's enough for about $charges $chargeUnit of coffee

reward.successMessage: Congratulations. Vic likes the book!

inventory.name: office door
inventory.detailedDescription: One of the main doors into the ground floor working area.

missions.name: keyfob
missions.description: If you haven't done so already, you'll need to sign in to get a keyfob for the office.

delivers.name: keyfob
delivers.detailedDescription: Carrying this ensures you have access to the office whenever you need.

reward.successMessage:
'Here's your key fob.'
'You'll need it to get in and out of some parts of the office.'

name: rest-area-ground-floor
description: You're in the ground floor rest area.

inventory.name: hammock
inventory.detailedDescription: It's a bit of a pig to climb into but well-worth the effort for a rest.

inventory.name: snack machine
inventory.detailedDescription: An almost endless supply of snacks and treats!

delivers.name: chocolate
delivers.detailedDescription: Mmmm tasty and loaded with calories.

delivers.name: crisps
delivers.detailedDescription: Sadly they're not Salt & Vinegar flavour - but they'll do in an emergency.

name: roof
description:
You're on the roof. With a bit of investment this would make a great roof terrace and bar.
However at the moment it's simply an open space with no safety rail - probably best you don't spend too long up here!

name: room-404
description: You're in Room 404. It's like a giant 'notfound' error staring at you from beneath a bowler hat.

inventory.name: brick
inventory.detailedDescription: This would make quite a good cudgel but it's likely to break.

name: rubbish-bins
description: You're rooting around in the Red Gate rubbish bins. What depths have you stooped to?

inventory.name: skip
inventory.detailedDescription:
It's full of rubbish.
It looks like a great place to hide things you don't want found!

attributes.defaultResult:
You clamber around in the skip.
After putting your hand in something slimy and nearly impaling yourself on a broken chair you decide to climb back out.

inventory.name: kitchen knife
inventory.detailedDescription:
It's rusty and old but still extremely sharp.
Is that dried blood on the hilt?

inventory.name: battered book
inventory.detailedDescription:
The texture of the cover gives you a slightly uncomfortable feeling.
The flyleaf simply says 'To Neil'. Further inspection reveals a heavily faded title; 'O  H nt  g Hu  ns'.
Odd.

missions.name: hunthumans
missions.description:
... 'In s  king nd tr  k ng your qu   y, it s  mp rt nt to be aw re  f scent.
 he  atura  t ail  f ph rom nes, decays over time.
Where a sc  t is suf  cien  y fr  h, on  may h nt  r f nd the b st dir ctio   n wh ch to fo lo '...
Wow, this is really badly degraded. I'm sure there's something really useful hiding in here if you can just figure it out.

reward.successMessage: Interesting. You feel like you've learned something important but will need to figure out exactly what it is.

name: sales-break-out
description: You're stood in a small break out area.

name: sales-main
description:
You're in the main sales and marketing area.
There's a low level hum of telephone conversation.

inventory.name: alex freeman
inventory.detailedDescription: Can haz mor Accountz.

inventory.name: james king
inventory.detailedDescription: He sells SQL Monitor like a mo'fo'.

inventory.name: justin heron
inventory.detailedDescription: He's a master of selling!

missions.name: hidejameswig
missions.description: Make the wig 'go away'.

dialogue:
'Hi $player.'
'I've got a job for you'
'Earlier this year, James had all the sales managers wear fancy dress as a 'reward' for the team hitting their record numbers.'
'It was a great move but I swear we don't want a repeat of the horror of James in drag again.'
'Can you hide his wig for us? (preferably somewhere out of the building!)'
'Hey $player, how's that secret errand going?

reward.successMessage:
Great stuff! No more managers in drag.
I think James might be a little disappointed with you but Justin will have appreciated it.

inventory.name: cassi roper
inventory.detailedDescription: She kicks ass on accounts, like many of the sales team, she's one of the reasons this place can afford to pay us all.

name: sales-north
description:
You're at the North end of the sales and marketing area.
To the North is a door. East is the marketing area and West are some recreational spaces.

name: sales-seating
description: You're in a small seating area. Peering down through the windows to the West you can see the atrium. To the North is a meeting room.

inventory.name: xbox
inventory.detailedDescription: Fancy a game of Forza?

attributes.defaultResult: After a few minutes of button-mashing you think it's probably time to go and do something useful instead.

name: sales-south
description: You're at the south end of the sales and marketing area.

name: second-floor-back-stairs-east
description:
You're at the top of the Eastern back staircase. This is very much a path less-travelled.
From here you can take a short-cut down to the Sales and Marketing teams or South to Finance and Facilities.

name: second-floor-back-stairs-west
description: You're standing at the top of the west fire escape staircase.

name: second-floor-cubicle
description:
You're in a toilet cubicle. The toilet is making some unhealthy gugling noises and the smell in here is terrible.
I think there's a good reason this one was out of order.

inventory.name: cubicle door
inventory.detailedDescription: When you're finished...

inventory.name: floor
inventory.detailedDescription: Shiny and clean.

attributes.defaultResult:
As you undo your trousers and squat, you consider the implication of your actions and decide you don't feel like being sacked today.
Repeat after me, 'I am not the phantom pooper.'
Time to tidy yourself up and learn to behave like a reasonable person.

inventory.name: toilet
inventory.detailedDescription: It looks like the maintenance team have been working on this one.

attributes.defaultResult:
You relieve yourself and flush the toilet...
Oh no, it's blocked!

The water slowly fills up to the brim of the bowl and stops just before the surface tension of the water gives way to disaster.
That was close!

There was a good reason why this cubicle was out of order.
As you recover your wits, the water slowly subsides back to normal levels.
When you get a chance, you might want to drop an anonymous maintenance request to the Facilities Team to sort your mess out.
attributes.smell: I'll leave it up to your imagination.

inventory.name: guardian newspaper
inventory.detailedDescription: Middle class pulp propaganda trash to be honest.

inventory.name: article on the boy scout principle
inventory.detailedDescription: It's entitled 'The Boy Scout Rule'.

missions.name: lotleasteregg
missions.description: Hmmm Interesting. It's available online.

reward.successMessage: Congratulations. You've learned a simple approach to keeping code clean.

name: second-floor-east-corridor
description: You're in the East corridor on the second floor. Domain of all things IS.

name: second-floor-fire-escape
description: You're on the second floor of the rear fire escape. It's windy up here.

name: second-floor-kitchen
description: You're in the second floor kitchen. There's a space where once a coffee machine sat but not much else here to tempt you to hand around upstairs now.

inventory.name: first aid kit
inventory.detailedDescription: There's enough equipment in here to heal a few nasty wounds.

name: second-floor-landing-central
description: You're in the middle of the second floor landing. From here you have a great view of the Autonomy Ant Farm over the road.

name: second-floor-landing-east
description: You're at the east end of the second floor landing. Peering through the window to the East, you can just about make out the facilities team on the other side of the glass.

inventory.name: office door
inventory.detailedDescription: One of the main doors into the first floor working area.

name: second-floor-landing-west
description: You're at the West end of the second floor landing. Peering over the balcony you consider throwing something down. If only there was a slide here.

name: second-floor-north-west-corridor-central
description: You're part-way along a roughly North-South running corridor in the North-West corner of the second floor. There are meeting rooms to the East and West.

name: second-floor-north-west-corridor-north-central
description: You're in a roughly North-South running corridor in the North-West corner of the second floor.

name: second-floor-north-west-corridor-north-east
description: You're at a bend in a roughly North-South running corridor in the North-West corner of the second floor. There are meeting rooms to the North and East.

name: second-floor-north-west-corridor-north-end
description: You're in a North-South corridor at the North-West corner of the second floor. To the North is a staircase leading down.

name: second-floor-north-west-corridor-south
description:
You're at the South end of a roughly North-South running corridor in the North-West corner of the second floor.
There's meeting room to the West. To the east is a curved glass partition behind which are printers and a stationery cupboard.

name: second-floor-printer-area
description: You're in a small glass-walled corner bounded by corridors.

inventory.name: cupboard
inventory.detailedDescription: Can haz all ur Scrum supplies.

attributes.extendedInventoryDescription: Amongst the mountains of redundant folders, staplers and pen holders you find $inventory that might be useful to you.

inventory.name: post-it pad
inventory.detailedDescription: A pack of multicoloured post-it notes.

inventory.name: notebook
inventory.detailedDescription:
An A4 'Black and Red' brand notebook.
These are really useful for keeping track of tasks.
In case you accidentally leave it somewhere, I strongly suggest you write your name in it though.

inventory.name: biro
inventory.detailedDescription: Not quite a sharpie but useful for taking notes.

inventory.name: sharpie
inventory.detailedDescription: Invaluable tool of the agilist.

inventory.name: batteries
inventory.detailedDescription: Shine a light on the world.

attributes.chargesDescription: There's enough for about $charges $chargeUnit of power

name: second-floor-reception
description: You're standing in the former reception area on the second floor. A CCTV camera looms over the desk area.

name: second-floor-seating-area-east
description:
You're in the East end of the second floor seating area.
You could stand here for hours reading the giant mural of post-it notes trying to spot the duplicates.

inventory.name: wall
inventory.description: a wall full of post-it notes
inventory.detailedDescription:
I see it! I can see the duplicate...
Oh. Nope, it's not.

inventory.name: door
inventory.detailedDescription: If you open the door, you'll probably set off an alarm.

name: second-floor-seating-area-west
description: You're in the West end of the second floor seating area.

name: second-floor-toilet
description:
You're in a bathroom. You can't quite remember what floor you're on.
Do those soap dispensers look different to you?
A sign on the toilet cubicle door says 'Temporarily out of order'

inventory.name: mirror
inventory.detailedDescription: You peer closely at yourself in the mirror and wonder if perhaps the Red Gate diet is getting to you a little.

inventory.name: hand dryer
inventory.detailedDescription: These things are good but loud.

attributes.defaultResult:
You wave your hands under the dryer for a minute or so.
You feel like your hands have been assaulted by a horde of angels.

inventory.name: soap
inventory.detailedDescription: Your mind must be playing tricks on you, it's just the same as all the others.

attributes.defaultResult: You push the top of the dispenser. With a little bit of slipping and repositioning you manage to lather and wash your hands.

inventory.name: cubicle door
inventory.detailedDescription: The lock on the door has a slot to allow turning from the outside with a suitable tool.

inventory.name: basin
inventory.detailedDescription: Clean and with a supply of fresh water.

delivers.name: water
delivers.detailedDescription: No real nutritional value but great for plants.

delivers.name: tomato plants
delivers.detailedDescription: They're well watered and fruiting.

inventory.name: tomatoes
inventory.detailedDescription: They're ripe and ready to pick.

attributes.defaultResult:
You'll need to ask Filippa if you want her tomatoes.
If you wait around long enough, I'm sure she'll be back.

name: second-floor-west-corridor
description:
You're in a short corridor that runs East-West. To the East is the second floor reception area.
To the north is a printer area that also houses a stationary cupboard. To the west lies the People team (and more winding corridors).

name: servery-back-corridor
description: You're in the back corridor of the SQL Servery. There's a slight smell of industrial kitchens here.

name: servery-kitchen
description: You're in the SQL Servery kitchen.

inventory.name: marmite
inventory.detailedDescription: Love it or hate it - your choice, but it is full of b-vitamins

inventory.name: margaret sexton
inventory.detailedDescription:
A true ray of sunshine every lunchtime. Serving you food on a daily basis.
Seriously - she's lovely and looks out for all of us.

missions.name: tomatoesformargaret
missions.displayName: get some fresh tomatoes for Margaret
missions.description: Margaret needs some fresh tomatoes.

dialogue:
'Hi $player.'
'We've got a minor catering emergency.'
'Our regular vegetable delivery has let us down and we're out of tomatoes.'
'If we don't get some soon, we'll not be able to feed everyone lunch.'
'Could you see if Filippa can spare any of hers?'

dialogue.response: 'Thanks $player.'
'Well, you're not very helpful are you.'
'Let me know if you can track some down.'
'Any sign of those tomatoes yet?'
'Excellent!'
'I won't ask again but I'm sure everyone would appreciate it if you can help.'

reward.successMessage:
Margaret says 'Thankyou so much $player.'
'I'm sure everyone will appreciate the effort you've gone to to keep us all fed.'

inventory.name: wayne stanford
inventory.detailedDescription: Chef Wayne, master of the Red Gate dessert!

name: servery-main
description: You're in SQL Servery. The smell of food and buzz of conversation are almost enough to overload your senses.

inventory.name: soup
inventory.detailedDescription: Butternut squash and coconut.

inventory.name: door
inventory.detailedDescription: If you open the door, you'll probably set off an alarm.

name: servery-north-west
description:
You're in the North-West end of the servery.
There's a wall full of postcards and a small kitchen area here.

inventory.name: wall
inventory.description: a wall full of post cards
inventory.detailedDescription: Poking through the cards on the wall, they generally have variations of 'thanks', 'you're wonderful' and similar meaningful platitudes.

inventory.name: first aid kit
inventory.detailedDescription: There's enough equipment in here to heal a few nasty wounds.

inventory.name: shreddies
inventory.detailedDescription: Shreddies... 'Cereal in the daytime?!' wow, I've never had that before.

inventory.name: postcard
inventory.detailedDescription: It says thanks for being great! (there are loads of others with similar thank-yous)

name: servery-salad-bar
description:
You're standing by the SQL Servery salad bar.
To the East is the sales and marketing area, to the West is the main area of the SQL Servery.

inventory.name: salad
inventory.detailedDescription: Mixed leaves, some cheese, beans, beetroot. All with a French dressing.

name: servery-south-west
description: You're in the South-West end of the servery. The lights of network switches and wiring looms blink silently at you, enticing you to play with the wires.

name: shower-ground-floor
description: You're in the ground floor showers. There's a lingering smell of deodorant, damp and cyclist sweat.

inventory.name: trainers
inventory.detailedDescription: These look pretty large. You're probably looking for a relatively tall owner for these.

attributes.defaultResult: They're far too big for you. Probably best to track down their rightful owner and reunite them.

name: signpost
description: You're in the SignPost meeting room.

name: smoking-area
description: You're outside the back of the office under the fire escape.

inventory.name: cat
inventory.detailedDescription: It looks like a stray. I think it's hungry.

attributes.smell: As you bend down and sniff the cat, it lashes out at you.

inventory.name: bench
inventory.detailedDescription: A comfortable spot to sit and rest for a while.

name: snorting-horses
description:
You're in the Snorting Horses meeting room.
There's a great view out of the windows. The table has been rendered to look like straw, one wall is covered in rosettes whilst the other mixes acoustic treatment with some rather alarming horse-head-shaped lighting.
Overall there's something deeply unsettling about spending time alone in here.

name: southeast-corridor-ground-floor
description: You're at the South-East intersection of two corridors on the ground floor.

name: southwest-corridor-ground-floor
description: You're in the South-West corner intersection of two corridors of the ground floor. There is a meeting room to the West.

name: spiderman
description:
You're in the Spiderman meeting room. (Or is that Spider-man?) There are large windows on 2 walls.
You feel somewhat exposed here

name: stairs-first-floor
description: You're halfway up the main office staircase.

inventory.name: office door
inventory.detailedDescription: One of the main doors into the first floor working area.

name: stairs-ground-floor
description: You're standing at the foot of the stairs.

inventory.name: office door
inventory.detailedDescription: One of the main doors into the ground floor working area.

name: stairs-second-floor
description: You're standing at the top of the main staircase The view's great from up here.

inventory.name: office door
inventory.detailedDescription: One of the main doors into the first floor working area.

name: support-east
description:
You're in support area.
From here you can make rude gestures and wave through the window at passers-by on the stairs.

name: support-west
description: You're in the support area.

inventory.name: chris allen
inventory.detailedDescription: Support and music skills. What more could you need?

name: thinking-hats
description: You're in the Thinking Hats meeting room. The seats in here are really tricky to pick up and move and it's oddly chilly. Perhaps it's haunted?

name: top-fire-escape
description:
You're at the top of the rear fire escape. From here you have a short climb up to the roof.
It's a long way down!

name: traffic-jam-meeting-room
description:
You're in the 'Traffic Jam' meeting room.
There's quite a good view outside from here although it does feel like a bit of a fishbowl.

name: war-room
description:
You're in the War room. Once upon a time this was a little-used library. It's a long narrow space that's not used for management stand-ups.
The walls are filled with long-forgotten organisational restructuring plans.

name: waste-area
description: You're by a locked gate. On the far side are a series of waste containers full of carboard boxes, broken furniture and kitchen leftovers.

inventory.name: pawel jonczak
inventory.detailedDescription: One of the hidden heroes of our catering team.

inventory.name: gate key
inventory.detailedDescription: This looks like the key to the waste area gate.

inventory.name: waste gate
inventory.detailedDescription: You've always been curious what interesting things get thrown in here.

name: web-meeting-room
description: You're in the Web meeting room.

name: west-bike-racks
description: You're standing at the South-West corner of the the office building.

inventory.name: bike racks
inventory.detailedDescription: There's dozens of bikes here but most of them are locked.

attributes.extendedInventoryDescription: After extensively picking through the crowded racks, you find $inventory.

inventory.name: old bike
inventory.detailedDescription: It's yours. Yay :D

attributes.defaultResult:
You're meant to be working!
You cycle around for a while until you feel guilty for not doing something more useful.

name: west-car-park
description:
You're standing in the West car park.
To the South are bike racks and a path running across the back of the Red Gate office building.

missions.name: saveredgate
missions.displayName: save Red Gate from the zombie contagion
missions.description:
The scene of devastation nearby looks very bad...
You need to help all the Red Gate staff survive the zombie apocalypse. Act quickly!

inventory.name: hard disk
inventory.detailedDescription: Pretty sure it belongs to Red Gate.

reward.successMessage:
Congratulations. You saved Red Gate from the zombie apocalypse. Now things can return to normal - right?
(That could have been very nasty).
But...
What caused the crash, did someone sabotage the flight?
reward.failMessage:
Oh no!
Looks like you weren't quick enough to save everyone. Someone we care about died in the zombie apocalypse.
You'd best get on with cleaning up the mess and making sure it doesn't get any worse.

name: west-corridor-ground-floor
description: You're near the South end of the West corridor of the ground floor.

name: west-end-south-corridor-ground-floor
description: You're near the West end of the South corridor on the ground floor.

name: windows-meeting-room
description:
You're in the 'Windows' meeting room.
It's a bit of a misnomer really as the meeting room next door has more windows. Perhaps it's just irony.
The room's slightly cramped with a small board, table and chairs but you can just about fit four people in here for a short meeting.
One of the walls is oddly curved for no obvious reason.
